about.name: Syed Khizar
about.title: Next.js Developer
about.subTitle: Specialized in High-Performance Web Applications & Scalable UI Architecture
about.description: A results-driven Next.js Developer with deep expertise in crafting premium, pixel-perfect digital experiences. I specialize in the full spectrum of modern web development‚Äîfrom architecting complex frontend logic with React and Next.js to seamless backend and API integrations. My workflow seamlessly bridges the gap between design and engineering, translating high-fidelity Figma prototypes into responsive, high-performance code. I am dedicated to building scalable, user-centric solutions that combine visual elegance with robust technical functionality.

üé® Achieved 100% design fidelity by translating complex Figma prototypes into pixel-perfect, responsive interfaces using Tailwind CSS and Framer Motion.
‚ö° Optimized frontend performance, reducing Time to Interactive (TTI) by 40% through advanced caching strategies, code-splitting, and lazy loading.
üõ† Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable, maintainable codebases that align with business objectives.

üß© Developed a modular design system with reusable components, significantly accelerating development velocity for future feature rollouts.

timeline.summary: Building a strong foundation in modern web development and UI implementation.

testimonials.name: Mian Haroon
testimonials.review: I had the pleasure of working closely with Syed khizar on a challenging project. He is a highly motivated developer who consistently delivered excellent results. His ability to understand complex requirements and implement efficient solutions was truly impressive. I would highly recommend him to any organization looking for a passionated developer.
